channel.title: Trying to make dragonfire shield like the real rs one
channel.description:
well I'm trying to make the dragonfire shield shoot fire like the real rs one. I want it when you are below 20 hp, it shoots fire randomly, and i have everything correct, except one thing.
I need a way to tell it something related to:
if(isattackingsomething) { then put the void to make it shoot a flame gfx but it freezes everytime it tries to shoot fire.
I am using the (1) gfx, which is dragonfire single breath. Please help..

item.title: Trying to make dragonfire shield like the real rs one
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

oh my, delta, that is a scratch off the surface for the coding this guy is gonna need, but, i like to help, so, heres what you need to do.

Create public ints for the dragonfire breath, and add the int addition to all dragon’s attack.
You probably want to make a new save line in moreinfo, also you need to add in attacking on, the methed for only if a person has 20 hp or less.

Now try the item cases, if you use pimpscape, and dont know what to do here, serch for the Yo-Yo ID, and serch it in client.java. This is really only a start, becuase something like that is sorta complex.

newservermaker:

why not just make a client with it? it would be much easeir…

… one already HAS been made!

he needs to add all the metheds to make it work… no offence… but that was un needed…

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to make dragonfire shield like the real rs one

item.title: Trying to make dragonfire shield like the real rs one
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

search for

PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true; PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);

yeah use this for the first two lines

if(playerEquipment[playerShield] == 11814) {
client plyr = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];

Read full topic
